00019 #ifndef _HOP_H
00020 #define _HOP_H
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <exception>
00024 #include "xmlnode.h"
00025 #include "observable.h"
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 class Hop;
00030 class HopException;
00031 
00032 class Hop : public Observable
00033 {
00034    
00035    public:
00036       Hop();
00037       Hop( Hop& other );
00038       Hop( const XmlNode *node );
00039 
00040       friend bool operator<( Hop &h1, Hop &h2 );
00041 
00042       std::string toXml();
00043       
00044       const string& getName() const;
00045       int getVersion() const;
00046       double getAlpha_pct() const;
00047       double getAmount_kg() const;
00048       const string& getUse() const;
00049       double getTime_min() const;
00050       
00051       const string& getNotes() const;
00052       const string& getType() const;
00053       const string& getForm() const;
00054       double getBeta_pct() const;
00055       double getHsi_pct() const;
00056       const string& getOrigin() const;
00057       const string& getSubstitutes() const;
00058       double getHumulene_pct() const;
00059       double getCaryophyllene_pct() const;
00060       double getCohumulone_pct() const;
00061       double getMyrcene_pct() const;
00062       
00063       //set
00064       void setName( const string &str );
00065       void setAlpha_pct( double num );
00066       void setAmount_kg( double num );
00067       bool setUse( const string &str );
00068       void setTime_min( double num );
00069       
00070       void setNotes( const string &str );
00071       bool setType( const string &str );
00072       bool setForm( const string &str );
00073       void setBeta_pct( double num );
00074       void setHsi_pct( double num );
00075       void setOrigin( const string &str );
00076       void setSubstitutes( const string &str );
00077       void setHumulene_pct( double num );
00078       void setCaryophyllene_pct( double num );
00079       void setCohumulone_pct( double num );
00080       void setMyrcene_pct( double num );
00081       
00082    private:
00083       // Mandatory members.
00084       string name;
00085       const static int version = 1;
00086       double alpha_pct;
00087       double amount_kg;
00088       string use;
00089       double time_min;
00090       
00091       // Optional members.
00092       string notes;
00093       string type;
00094       string form;
00095       double beta_pct;
00096       double hsi_pct;
00097       string origin;
00098       string substitutes;
00099       double humulene_pct;
00100       double caryophyllene_pct;
00101       double cohumulone_pct;
00102       double myrcene_pct;
00103       
00104       // Sets every member to zero or blank or whatever.
00105       void setDefaults();
00106       // Misc functions.
00107       static bool isValidUse(const string &str);
00108       static bool isValidType(const string &str);
00109       static bool isValidForm(const string &str);
00110 };
00111 
00112 class HopException : public std::exception
00113 {
00114 public:
00115    
00116    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00117    {
00118       // Note: this temporary object might get destroyed too early.
00119       // I'm not really sure.
00120       return std::string("BeerXml HOP error: " + _err + "\n").c_str();
00121    }
00122    
00123    HopException( std::string message )
00124    {
00125       _err = message;
00126    }
00127    
00128    ~HopException() throw() {}
00129    
00130 private:
00131    
00132    std::string _err;
00133 };
00134 
00135 struct Hop_ptr_cmp
00136 {
00137    bool operator()( Hop* lhs, Hop* rhs)
00138    {
00139       return *lhs < *rhs;
00140    }
00141 };
